folder: Mickle Avenue & Arnow Avenue, Bronx, NY
text:
(1)
Mickle Ave., east side, about 150 feet north of Arnow Ave., showing the Palmer Homestead. The above is the exact location of the house according to Bromley's awp of 1927. The map of 1900 shows the house and farm to be within the triangle Eastchester Road, Givan Drive and
Palmer Boulevard.
June 1, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, another view. In the foreground is Eastchester Road,
the vantage point.
June 1, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
An additional view of the same. The driveway, here shown, Palmer Boulevard (mentioned in view 1), is no longer in existence.
June 1, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
